question: Samsung has tied-up with which bank to offer 'Bill Payments' on Samsung Pay?
explanation: Smartphone manufacturer Samsung has recently launched its \'Bill Payments\' on its flagship payments service \"Samsung Pay\" in partnership with Axis Bank. The new feature launched by the company will enable users to pay their utility bills seamlessly via Samsung Pay\'s secure and convenient platform. With the introduction of \'Bill Payments\', consumers will be able to pay their utility bills seamlessly via Samsung Pay. It will offer users a secure, hassle free, and instant payment option on-the-go. Consumers can view due amount, details of previous bills and location-based suggested billers while paying bills through Samsung Pay. One can also set \'reminders\' for bill payments.
